artist: Author: Jacks Ashley McNamara; Publisher: Jacks Ashley McNamara , Oakland
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, xerographic copy of spiral-binding along the left hand side, with an illustration of a tree, text in white on a black ground, and a photo-collage in the lower center; 40 pp.
title: So Many Ways to Be Beautiful
